data_table.description: The WHI Imputation sample attributes data table includes sample ID, sample analyte type (DNA), body site where samples were collected, tumor status, sample origin (GARNET, WHIMS, SHARE-AA, SHARE-HA, HIPFX, MOPMAP, GECCO-INIT, GECCO-CYTO), genotyping array name, relatedness, duplicates, inconsistent ethnicity, and principal component scores (PC) 1-10.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: The body site where the original sample was taken.

variable.name: ANALYTE_TYPE
variable.description: Category of analyte measured. DNA in all cases.

variable.name: SAMPLE_ORIGIN
variable.description: Sample sub-study. One of the following: GARNET, WHIMS, SHARE-AA, SHARE-HA, HIPFX, MOPMAP, GECCO-INIT, GECCO-CYTO
variable.value: Genetics and Epidemiology of Colorectal Cancer Consortium - CytoChip GWAS
Genetics and Epidemiology of Colorectal Cancer Consortium - Initial GWAS
Genome-wide Association Study to Identify Genetic Components of Hip Fracture
Genetic Modification of PM-Mediated Arrhythmogenesis in Populations (AS264)
SNP Health Association Resource - African Americans
SNP Health Association Resource - Hispanic Americans

variable.name: GENOTYPING_ARRAY
variable.description: Name of the genotyping array(s) used

variable.name: Relatedness
variable.description: A flag indicating that this sample is part of a relationship set (0=no, 1=yes). Information regarding relatedness can be found in WHI_GWAS_relatedness_information.csv

variable.name: InconsistentEthnicity
variable.description: A flag indicating that the ethnicity observed in the sample does not match the ethnicity self-reported on the WHI form 2
